title: Oversized One Bedroom
posting_body: ['Large one bedroom apartment for rent in the South Beach section of Staten Island.', 'The apartment is located in a private two family home.', ' It is a two level apartment, main private entrance.', ' First level is kitchen and dining area and second level is one bedroom, living room, and full bathroom.', 'The apartment is conveniently located within minutes of a drive to Staten Island University Hospital the Verrazano Bridge/Brooklyn.', 'Easy access to all area colleges, Staten Island transportation and express buses to NYC.', ' Plenty of  street parking.', 'Appliances included (refrigerator, dish washer) -- no laundry on premises and no hook ups in the apartment -- there is a laundromat in walking distance.', 'NO PETS and NO SMOKING.', ' Move in date is flexible.', "Rent is $1,600 per month (includes utilities - heat/electric/water) with a security deposit of one month's rent required.", 'Contact 917-796-1306 for more information and to arrange a viewing.', 'Please leave a message if we do not answer-your call will be returned.']
